page.title: 17TRANSPORT - IDEN GREEN
page.content: RAIL: Nearest stations 9 miles - Etchingham or Staplehurst. ROAD: School Buses take children to Cranbrook. Private Mini-buses collect workers for Benenden Chest Hospital and Benenden Girls School. Care are of prime importance. Only the retired of limited means do not own one and many households have 2. Most young learn to drive a 17 years old. Bicycles are also used. In 1980 there was 1 bus per week through Iden Green but in 1985 a private firm provide a subsidized service to Tunbridge Wells once daily, Tenterden, Maidstone, Rye once a week, Eastbourne 5 summer specials. Broad 2086 carries 2 hourly service to Tunbridge Wells and Tenterden. 3 London buses daily. Specials to Camber Sands, Brighton, Folkestone in Spring and Summer holidays.
